webscript.description:
This service is used to get SIDE contents using cmis
originally designed for facetMap web application

Parameters :
userName : user name to use userpwd : user password (optional if userTicket filled) userTicket : the authenticate ticket for this user siteName : site contains facetmap docs Exemples : com/bluexml/side/facetMap/sitesMembershipValidation?siteName=demo&userName=admin&userTicket=2344535
